revision.text:
[[Image:Sochi Skyscrapers.jpeg|100x100px|Sochi]]
*1 July 1952 – Vineland borough and Landis Township were merged to form city of '''[[Vineland, New Jersey]]''' *1 July 2009 – Beginning of broadcasting of '''[[National Geographic Abu Dhabi]]''' *21 July 1983 – Lowest recorded temperature on [[Earth]] at '''[[South Pole]]''', [[Vostok Station]] *30 July 2000 – Hottest temperature recorded in '''[[Sochi]]''' ''(pictured)'', [[Krasnodar Krai]], [[Russia]]
